definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Everyonetakes his or her seat and settles in for a lovely afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 在美麗的午後，善男信女落座於各自的位置。

sentences.english: Don't be a nice person if you want to safeguard your relationship.
sentences.chinese: 想要捍衛愛情，就別當善男信女。

sentences.english: The jade lotus temple good believes is numerous, the joss stick is vigorous.
sentences.chinese: 玉蓮寺善男信女衆多，香火鼎盛。

sentences.english: Entering the temple, the worshippers placed their gifts before the gods.
sentences.chinese: 進入寺廟之後，善男信女們將祭品供奉於諸神面前。

definition: to burn incense and worship Buddha
to burn incense at a temple
to go on a pilgrimage and offer incense (idiom)
acolyte in charge of incense in a temple
to worship/to make customary deferences to/a pilgrimage
